    Author:
    Mato Kormuth

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChange(BlockChange change)
      Registers a change to this rollbacker.
      void rollback()
      Reverts all registered changes right after call of this function.
      void rollbackAsync(java.lang.Runnable onFinished)
      Starts a task for rollbacking with default (128) amount of blocks reverted in one tick.
      void rollbackAsync(java.lang.Runnable onFinished, int maxIterations)
      Starts a task for rollbacking with specified amount of blocks reverted in one tick.

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
        Reverts all registered changes right after call of this function. (Not recomended)

      • rollbackAsync

        public void rollbackAsync(java.lang.Runnable onFinished)
        Starts a task for rollbacking with default (128) amount of blocks reverted in one tick.
        Parameters:
        onFinished - runnable, that should be called after the rollback is done.

      • rollbackAsync

        public void rollbackAsync(java.lang.Runnable onFinished,
                 int maxIterations)
        Starts a task for rollbacking with specified amount of blocks reverted in one tick.
        Parameters:
        onFinished - runnable, that should be called after the rollback is done.
